message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000.
